title: TOSY Flying Disc - 16 Million Color RGB or 36 or 360 LEDs, Extremely Bright, Smart Modes, Auto Light Up, Rechargeable, Cool Fun Christmas, Birthday & Camping Gift for Men/Boys/Teens/Kids, 175g frisbee
descriptions:
TOSY Flying Disc – the easy, bright, and safe way to play catch, day or night.

What it is:
- A sturdy flying disc that lights up so you can always see it. It is the standard weight used by professionals (175 grams), which means it flies straight and true.

Why it’s easy to use:
- Very bright lights: 36 LEDs that are up to 100 times brighter than typical light-up discs. You can choose from many colors, so it’s easy to spot in the dark.
- Smart auto-on: Motion sensors turn the lights on when you throw or catch it. No tiny switches to fumble with.
- Simple settings: You can set brightness and a timer if you want the lights to turn off after play.

Power and charging:
- Rechargeable battery. About 30 minutes to fully charge.
- Play up to a thousand throws or about a 90-minute game on one charge.
- Comes with a USB Type‑C to Type‑C cable. Use any USB‑C charger you already have. (Wall charger not included.)

Comfort and safety:
- Comfortable grip for easy catching.
- Waterproof and highly durable for parks, beaches, and backyards.
- Flies long, straight, and precise, so you don’t need to throw hard.

Great for:
- Evening walks, family gatherings, or gentle exercise.
- Fun games like Beersbee/Polish Horseshoes, or simple toss-and-catch.
- Showing grandkids colorful light patterns at night.

Getting started:
1) Charge with the included USB‑C cable until full.
2) Pick your light color and brightness (or just throw—motion turns it on).
3) Toss gently to a partner and enjoy the bright, easy-to-see disc.

If you want a reliable, easy-to-spot disc that’s gentle on the hands and simple to charge, the TOSY Flying Disc makes night play clear and fun for everyone.
